Row.Text: "All that is gold does not glitter,[NEWLINE]Not all those who wander are lost."
"For anybody else it was a mistake, but if you think it was a sinâ€”then it's a sin. A fella builds his own sins right up from the groun'."
"I will show you fear in a handful of dust."
"What for centuries raised man above the beast is not the cudgel but the irresistible power of unarmed truth."
"Live and act within the limit of your knowledge and keep expanding it to the limit of your life."
